alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 12:49PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Navajo County just east of Winslow through 215 PM MDT... At 148 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Joseph City, or 11 miles east of Winslow, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Navajo County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 near mile marker 265. State Route 87 between mile markers 355 and 364. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
